message: Dear guys at Convore, it was quite annoying for me to suddenly receive an email saying somebody created a new topic on one of the groups I'm member of. Why wasn't this an opt-in feature instead of an opt-out one? I don't recall checking any "I want to receive notifications" checkbox.
Whenever you join a new group, there should be a checkbox at the top of it asking if you want to receive email notifications for it or not. I believe the box is checked by default, though.

Here's an example of what I mean, as I just joined a group:
